title: 练习场
content:
[[div class="content-panel standalone centered" style="color: #fff; background: #900; padding: 30px 0 35px; width: 400px; margin: 0 auto 20px;"]]
**[[size 500%]]禁止入内[[/size]]**
[[/div]]

= **[[size 120%]]SCP Wiki上不再允许创建//草稿//页面。[[/size]]**
= 如有需要，请使用 **[http://www.scp-wiki.net/sandbox SCP Sandbox Wiki]** 。

----
下列为所有剩余的//草稿//页面。其中一些是员工所使用的测试页面，应要求继续存放于主站点，其他一些则是SCP沙箱Wiki存在之前的遗留页面。未经工作人员许可，请不要继续创建更多//草稿//页面。

[http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-c-skalisharpnose SCP-C-Skalisharpnose] by [[*user Skali Sharpnose]] (29 May 2009, 05:36)

[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/lurker-sandbox Lurker-沙盒] by [[*user Lurker_Syx]] (17 May 2009, 14:07)

[http://www.scp-wiki.net/dr-rights-draft-box Dr Rights' Draft Box] by [[*user agatharights]] (2 Feb 2009, 02:58)

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/work-manifest-for-dr-gears Gears博士的工作清单] by [[*user Dr Gears]] (31 Dec 2008, 03:13)

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/dr-kondraki-s-work-log Kondraki博士的工作日志] by [[*user Dr Kondraki]] (4 Dec 2008, 22:58)

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/dr-rights-personal-log Rights博士的个人日志] by [[*user agatharights]] (27 Nov 2008, 07:03)

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/crow-s-note-s-and-to-do-list Crow的笔记和“任务列表”] by [[*user Kain Pathos Crow]] (22 Nov 2008, 04:59)

[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/the-pair-of-duck-s-file 一对鸭子的档案] by [[*user Pair Of Ducks]] (9 Oct 2008, 02:38)

[https://www.scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/warning-labels 警告标签] by [[*user Kain Pathos Crow]] (27 Jul 2008, 11:46)
author: TwilightC
